channel.generator: NSW National Parks and Wildlife Service
channel.title: NSW National Parks - Fires, floods and park closures
channel.description: This RSS feed provides information on current fires, floods, park closures, fire bans and hazard reduction burns for parks and reserves throughout NSW.

item.title: Abercrombie River National Park
item.description:
HAZARD REDUCTION BURNS
Hazard reduction burn
Tea Tree West Hazard Reduction 
Bounded by: Felled Timber Creek, Claytons Fire Trail, Tea Tree Fire Trail.
No closures to Abercrombie campsites, but the above Fire Trails will be closed.
 Contact Oberon NPWS 63361972
